task_intent.title: Body Composition Tracking with BMR/TDEE
task_intent.description: Complete body composition logging system including height, weight, body fat percentage, muscle mass, with automatic BMR (Mifflin-St Jeor) and TDEE calculations. Visualize changes over time with Swift Charts graphs showing trends and goal progress.

task_intent.title: 005-korean-food-database-integration
task_intent.description: Integrate Korean Food & Drug Administration (식약처) food nutrition database API as primary source, with USDA FoodData Central as fallback for international foods. Prioritize Korean dishes (kimchi jjigae, bibimbap, tteokbokki) that are poorly covered by competitors.

task_intent.title: 008-exercise-tracking-with-met-calculations
task_intent.description: Exercise logging with activity type selection, duration input, and automatic calorie burn calculation using MET (Metabolic Equivalent of Task) values. Track both cardio and strength training with appropriate calculations.
